Package com.scar.android.Activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    About
    Simple about activity to show off what the app is about
    AddServer
    Activity for creating new servers for the app to use
    CreatePassword
    Activity for creating new logins for SCAR
    LoginActivity
    Activity for logging into scar
    MainActivity
    The main activity of the app, see chart below to see flow of app
    MainActivity.MessageHandler  
    MetaFile
    Activity for displaying a files contents can also delete the file via this activity when in the app Created by John on 7/27/2015.
    ModifyServer
    Activity for handling of Modifying servers, this is very similar to that of AddServers Except now you have known servers and you can click on servers to edit via their Store fragment
